craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: Contributing to a kill grants +30 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 2).

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: Attacks deal an additional 12% enemy current Health as Physical Damage.

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: Heal for 25% of all damage dealt

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: After casting, wearer gains 18% of its max Mana per attack

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs: Wearer revives with 400 HP

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 35% of the damage dealt.

craf.name: ZekesHerald
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs: +100% Crit. Dmg

craf.name: RapidFirecannon
craf.add_attrs: Attack Range is doubled

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Basic Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. No stacking limit.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 80 magic damage to 3/4/5 enemies.

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 50 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 70% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

craf.name: ZzRotPortal
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1000/2000/3000 ★ Health aries to continue the fight.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs: Critical hits reduce the target’s Armor by 75% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: Wearer's Spell Power stat is amplified by 50%

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 150 / 175 / 225 magic damage.

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs: Shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250 / 275 / 350 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs: Your spells can Crit

craf.name: SeraphsEmbrace
craf.add_attrs: Wearer regains 20 mana after spellcast

craf.name: FrozenHeart
craf.add_attrs: Angrenzende Gegner verlieren 50% Angriffstempo. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow)

craf.name: Chalice
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer casts a spell, restores 8 mana to allies within 2 hexes.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs: Each planning phase, gain one: Deal +50% more damage / Basic Attack heal 50 health on Hit

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100 / 140 / 200 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 second maximum). Scales with wearer’s Star Level.

craf.name: SwordBreaker
craf.add_attrs: 25% chance to disarm for 3 seconds

craf.name: RedBuff
craf.add_attrs: Gains 25% max hp true damage over 10 seconds on hit in addition to its burn. And reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

craf.name: Shroud
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 40% until they cast.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs: Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%

craf.name: Zephyr
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs: [UNIQUE] The wearer is immute to croud control for the first 10 seconds of combat

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: The wearer regenerates 5% of their missing Health per second. (max of 150 HP/tick)

craf.name: Backhand
craf.add_attrs: Start combat with a spell shield. Stun the champion that breaks it for 4 sec

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs: Each planning phase, fetch two temporary items, quality based upon your player level. [Consumes Three item Slots]

spec.name: Infiltrator
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Infiltrator trait.

spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Demolitionist trait.

spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Star Guardian trait.

spec.name: RebelMedal
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Rebel trait.

spec.name: Celestial
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

spec.name: Protector
spec.attrs: The wearer gains the Protector trait.

spec.name: Darkstar
